entry.title: With My Heart on a Trigger
entry.summary:
Author: TrivialCrow

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 10,463Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 76

Summary: Three years ago, Dick Grayson developed a technology that put him in the crosshairs of dangerous people, and Jason Todd was assigned to protect him. Three years ago, Jason broke the only rule that mattered, and fell in love with a client. That mistake cost him the job, the relationship, and very nearly his life. Now, Dick is back to unveil the same technology that drove him underground, and it’s Jason’s job to ensure the mistakes of the past stay in the past. Dick Grayson is a job, and Jason is a professional. Besides, two weeks on bodyguard duty isn’t enough to heal three years of hurt, and he’s already learned his lesson, hasn’t he?

entry.title: You are precious to me.
entry.summary:
Author: Nyx_dreamy

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 154,110Chapters: 56/?Kudos: 339

That is how he end up living with Dick. Dick is conflicated about his feelings for Jason. Damian is now under his care and him and Bruce are still awkward around each other. And something is up with Tim but he doesn't know what. Jason is waiting for Dick to give him a proper answer. His hate for Bruce is too strong and he do not feel welcome in their perfect little family. or Everyone is dealing with things and their family is slowly falling appart. entry.title: The Inheritance
entry.summary:
Author: HopelesslyObsessed

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 23,369Chapters: 10/?Kudos: 115

Summary: They had an agreement that for Jason's sake, she'd keep her distance. But when he dies a few weeks short of his sixteenth birthday, it becomes her biggest regret. So, what if he'd had a crush on her? If only she'd been there, maybe things wouldn't have ended so tragically. She shouldn't have ever set foot in Gotham again, but Bruce was going down a dark path, and they both needed Joker to pay for what he did. The clown remains elusive, and she can't deny that Bruce's violence is rubbing off on her. When they finally catch him, things don't end well for any of them, and she's driven further than Bludhaven in search of herself. It starts as a cover, a cathartic act to help her work through her emotions, but her pain runs deeper, and the only relief she finds is in another young mercenary, who has almost as much as her to hide, and a similar taste in red.

entry.title: Glass Rain
entry.summary:
Author: soaring_bubblegum

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 234,617Chapters: 51/54Kudos: 1,832

Summary: Jason Todd wakes up in the wrong Gotham. Here, he stayed dead. Here, his death broke his family so completely they became the monsters they once fought. Dick Grayson haunts the skyline with wings and talons, Barbara Gordon moves like a spider made of shadow, and something that might have once been Batman rules from a corrupted cave. The city is quarantined, the air tastes of ozone and old blood, and Jason should be running. Instead, he finds himself drawn to the creature that was once his brother—the one stalking him through twisted streets with eyes that still burn with something almost human. Some hunts, it turns out, go both ways.

entry.title: Tired Stars
entry.summary:
Author: ResidentJazz

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 28,270Chapters: 10/?Kudos: 439

Summary: Dick Grayson has always known how to smile on command, how to play the part people expect — even when it tears him apart. After a public breakdown and a mission that pushes him past his limits, Bruce’s disappointment feels like another verdict he can’t escape. But Jason refuses to let him spiral alone.In the quiet of a safe house, between coffee that tastes like ash, late-night movies, and the weight of a case too close to home, Dick has to confront the question he’s never dared to ask: who is he when he isn’t what Bruce made him?One step at a time, he’ll have to find out.

That's the reason he is tasked to look after their youngest player on the olympic roster.
